intro: An Aisling is an adventure game focused on exploration, story, and character. Make friends or enemies as you try to uncover why people are dissappearing on the island of Rashinmore.
description:
Siobhan awakens from a dream at the highest point of the island Rashinmore. Rashinmore was once a quiet and warm community, games were played and friends were made. Nothing bad would ever happen here, but things change. In the last week a disappearance has left people lost and devastated. Everyone wants answers, but the ones in charge don't seem to have a clue. If they're not going to lift a finger to find out whats going on, who will...? 

Things feel different when the sun goes down... is there something hiding in the dark?

Key Features:

- Run, jump, talk or even punch your way through the island as you uncover the mystery on Rashinmore. 

- Choose to make friends or enemies with a colourful cast of characters and creatures. 

- Paint pictures, catch creatures, conduct choirs, run races and see stars.

- Original art and soundtrack.

- Not one but two dogs! There's maybe even a secret third...
